section.title: The Windows Installation procedure
section.p: Download the lattest windows EXE Installer from source forge (note the version you need to download for your organiser)
Connect your organiser to windows via Active Sync. Usually you place the organiser in the cradle and a connection will be made automatically.
Backup your organiser for extra safety (Backup from Windows Active Sync or other prefered method. Prior to performing any installation, it is a good idea to backup your organiser for extra safety.

Run the XCSoar EXE. This will be called something like "Install-XCSoar-nnn.exe" - where nnn is the version number you have downloaded and the organiser type. You can usually just double click on the downloaded EXE on the desktop.
Follow the prompts on windows first for installation and then on the organiser

Restart (see operating instructions) the orgasier to get full suport for fonts and Start Page. This is an optional step. Resetting your organiser before use of XCSoar is a good practice. After restart the "FLY" (for full GPS versio) and "SIM" (for XCSoar Simulator mode) launcher icons will be available on the Today screen of your organiser.
Choose Simulator from your Today screen
Now have a play. Review the Quick Start Guide for more informaiton on what to do next.
For further information see the FAQ
